game_options.label: Title ID of Installed Application
game_options.help: Title ID of installed application. Eg."PCSG00042". User installed apps are located in ux0:/app/<title-id>.

runner_options.label: Config location
runner_options.help: Get a configuration file from a given location. If a filename is given, it must end with ".yml", otherwise it will be assumed to be a directory.

runner_options.label: Load configuration file
runner_options.help: If trues, informs the emulator to load the config file from the "Config location" option.
